attributes.action: Stop the Annual Yulin Dog meat festival in China!
attributes.additional_details: Evidence is given through social media daily on video and photographic images of animals been tortured, burnt, boiled and skin Alived, cramped in small cages in disgusting conditions, beaten, blow torched and tortured, ignoring all animal welfare
attributes.background: This is a disgusting and cruel festival that is ignoring animal welfare and practicing torturous killing of dogs for the meat trade, this is a well known festival that thousands of individuals have petitioned against and still the festival persists, we cannot ignore cruelty to animals
